description: Signature sequence of 1/sqrt(5) (arrange the numbers i+j*x (i,j >= 1) in increasing order; the sequence of i's is the signature of x).
references: C. Kimberling, "Fractal Sequences and Interspersions", Ars Combinatoria, vol. 45 p 157 1997.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: signseq[n_] := Take[ Transpose[ Sort[ Flatten[ Table[{i + j*n, i}, {i, Max[15, 15n]}, {j, Max[15, 15/n]}], 1], #1[[1]] < #2[[1]] &]][[2]], 105]; signseq[1/Sqrt[5]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 20 2004 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 20 2004
